mapper.select: SELECT id, ip, reason, NVL(blocked_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as blocked_at, unblocked_at, login_attempts, last_attempt_at FROM ip_block WHERE unblocked_at IS NULL ORDER BY blocked_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ip_block (id, ip, reason, blocked_at, login_attempts, last_attempt_at) VALUES (ip_block_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ip}, #{reason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockedAt}, #{loginAttempts}, #{lastAttemptAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE ip_block SET unblocked_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ip = #{ip} AND unblocked_at IS NULL
